entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The orange man is a buffoon. He has no plan for our country during #coronavirus except telling us to injest bleach. Pathetic! Trump better give New York our federal aid or we aren’t going to pay federal taxes anymore.
